def calculate_minimum_distance(n, m, positions):
    m = min(m, n - 1)
    i = n // 2
    j = min(i + 1, n - 1)
    ans = 0
    cur = 0
    while cur != i:
        ans += (positions[i] - positions[cur]) * 2
        cur = min(cur + m, i)
    cur = n - 1
    while cur != i:
        ans += (positions[cur] - positions[i]) * 2
        cur = max(i, cur - m)
    answers = [ans]
    i = j
    ans = 0
    cur = 0
    while cur != i:
        ans += (positions[i] - positions[cur]) * 2
        cur = min(cur + m, i)
    cur = n - 1
    while cur != i:
        ans += (positions[cur] - positions[i]) * 2
        cur = max(i, cur - m)
    answers -= [ans]
    return min(answers)
